Text: Building Guy Script Mark Haedicke Scene Cc Cash asked me to forward this script to you I will be in touch with Janette to schedule the most convenient time for filming on Tuesday or Wednesday April or Thanks Script Quarterly Mandatory Office Move Policy Location The Construction Site Props Substitute Building Guy in Building Guy Attire Hard Hat tool belt Mark Haedicke with Hard Hat and Blazer Script ENA Lawyer in an Obsequious Voice Hey Substitute Building Guy Im wi th ENA Legal and Ive had four office moves this past year because of construction on our floor Please please tell me that when we move to the new building I wont have to move offices ever again Substitute Building Guy with Mark Haedicke standing next to him Well good news I can promise you that new building will be Enrons state of the art and Jeff Skilling has mandated that there wont be any more construc tion in the new building for at least years after it opens But as for whethe r youll be moving offices again I think I better let your general counse l Mark Haedicke address that question Mark Mark Haedicke in a dry public service announcement deadpan Thanks Substitute Building Guy and thank you lawyers name for your question Lawyers name as you pointed out you have had to move times this y ear and although you may feel its been disruptive your office moves and th ose of your colleagues have produced some very valuable unintended consequences that we want to continue enjoying first constant office moves promote increased collegiality second constant office moves ensure that ENA Legal remains at the cutting edge of Enrons document retention policies and third constant office moves have dramatically reduced our outside counsel litigation fees since we have no documents to produce during discovery requests As a result I am pleased to announce our new quarterly office move policy Our new quarterly office move policy will continue to promot e the foregoing objectives and in fact I intend to suggest to Jim Derrick a t the next general counsels meeting that we implement this policy on a corporate basis Remember we may be done with construction but well never be done moving Michelle Cash Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB Houston Texas This message may contain confidential information that is protected by the attorneyclient andor work product privileges

BidAsk AffidavitsB NonPrivilegedpst Scott Breedlove V E Dallas called re affidavits I suggested he send an email stating the subjectinformation to be covered in each affidavit Based on that you can decide the best person to attest to the content Diane

EnronOnline Promotional Materials Cc B NonPrivilegedpst I am working with Richard Sanders and Jay Webb in defending EnronOnlline in a lawsuit based on alleged patent infringement As part of our preparation for this case we need to obtain a copy of all promotional materials related to EOnline I understand there is a client packet and I assume we had press releases and other materials I have printed everything in the Press Release section from the website Can you direct me to the appropriate person to obtain these materials Thanks for your assistance Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

BidAskB NonPrivilegedpst Peter Mims called this am He reviewed the documents we sent yesterday and seemed pleased We wants more detail on the specific section pertaining to clearing of orders I spoke with Leonardo Pacheco who suggested we meet with Kevin Montagne he reports directly to Jay Webb and is the Sr Director in charge of IT ECommerce Ive left a voice mail to get on his calendar on Monday for a meeting with Peter and Bill Do you want to attend if I get time with him Thanks

RE BidAskB NonPrivilegedpst Ive left a message for Peter to let me know what time slot works based on your calendar to to or to Peter will coordinate with Bill Ill keep you posted Original Message From Sanders Richard B Sent Friday October AM To Goode Diane Subject RE BidAsk Yes Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Friday October AM To Sanders Richard B Subject BidAsk Importance High Peter Mims called this am He reviewed the documents we sent yesterday and seemed pleased We wants more detail on the specific section pertaining to clearing of orders I spoke with Leonardo Pacheco who suggested we meet with Kevin Montagne he reports directly to Jay Webb and is the Sr Director in charge of IT ECommerce Ive left a voice mail to get on his calendar on Monday for a meeting with Peter and Bill Do you want to attend if I get time with him Thanks

RE Enron On Line DemoB NonPrivilegedpst Sure Ill let them know Original Message From Sanders Richard B Sent Tuesday October AM To Goode Diane Subject RE Enron On Line Demo Is there any way that we can move this to I have a meeting from Or just move it back min Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Monday October PM To Sanders Richard B Subject Enron On Line Demo Tom Engel will conduct the demonstration for Bill LaFuze and Peter Mims on Wednesday at pm I will meet Bill and Peter at pm and escort them to the new building Tom Engel will do sample trades and answer any questions they have Do you want to participate Thanks

Enron On Line DemoB NonPrivilegedpst Tom Engel will conduct the demonstration for Bill LaFuze and Peter Mims on Wednesday at pm I will meet Bill and Peter at pm and escort them to the new building Tom Engel will do sample trades and answer any questions they have Do you want to participate Thanks

Request for Exemption from Email Destruction POlicy Cc Sent at request of Richard Sanders Legal Department As part of our defense in the BidAsk litigation please exempt the following employees from the email destruction policy Bob Hillier Joe Nieten Jason Althaus Michale Belmont Christine Dinh Teresa Smith Tony Thomas Douglas Cummins Stacey Ramsey Chris Bowling Mai Nguyen Fred Philipson Francis Gonzales Savita Puthigai If you have any questions regarding this request please contact Richard Sanders at Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

BidAskB NonPrivilegedpst Kevin Montagne is running the code reports I should have them sometime Tuesday I spoke will Bill and let him know we would have the code tomorrow Kevin Montagne said his research indicates we do lock two records when there is an order I relayed that info to Bill

Request for Freeze on EMail Destruction Cc B NonPrivilegedpst At Richard Sanders request we ask that you freeze destruction of electronic mail for the following individuals effective immediately This request is made in regard to the BidAsk patent litigation We should retain their email communications going back as far as possible Jay Webb Kevin Montagne Jarod M Jenson Mark E Taylor legal Michael Guadarrama Louise Kitchen Marcello Romano London Rennu G Varghese David Forster We will be sending an additional list of IT persons on Tuesday Please let me know what else I need to do to expedite this process Thank you for your help Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

FW Design Documents for EOLB NonPrivilegedpst Richard These are the newest documents we recieved from Jay Webbs group I am printing the documents and stamping them privileged and confidential I will prepare a set to go to Peter Mims and Bill LaFuze via messenger I understand Jay Webb is anxious about the distribution of these materials I have drafted a letter to Bill and Peter that indicates they should notify us before making any distribution of the materials Do we want to keep a log of which materials are sent to various individuals Let me know Original Message From Pacheco Leonardo Sent Thursday October AM To Goode Diane Subject FW Design Documents for EOL Diane As per your request As you know the following are extremely confidential Original Message From Montagne Kevin Sent Thursday October AM To Pacheco Leonardo Subject Design Documents for EOL Leonardo attached are three documents showing more detail information about the real time and nonreal time parts of EnronOnline Please note these are very specific to how EnronOnline works and should be very tightly controlled Jay wants to know who gets these documents and to whom they are distributed Thanks Kevin Montagne x

Request for Freeze on EMail Destruction Cc At Richard Sanders request we ask that you freeze destruction of electronic mail for the following individuals effective immediately This request is made in regard to the BidAsk patent litigation We should retain their email communications going back as far as possible Jay Webb Kevin Montagne Jarod M Jenson Mark E Taylor legal Michael Guadarrama Louise Kitchen Marcello Romano London Rennu G Varghese David Forster We will be sending an additional list of IT persons on Tuesday Please let me know what else I need to do to expedite this process Thank you for your help Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom
Lunch with Paul Pryzant Need to select placenumber at the office is You need to pick a place Hes in Chase Tower I told him we would reconfirm the morning of

Meeting Thursday Correctionapologies I sent invitations to the Thursday afternoon meeting but failed to change the meeting time to pm Please calendar the meeting in Conference Room EB for pm not am as shown on the meeting invitation This is the first time Ive set a meeting this way Sorry for the inconvenience
CLE Class Akin Gumpregistered you for class They are sending details Diane
PRC File Cc Kathy Schultea called Shes been trying to send the file for over an hour Her system locked up Shell resend I have her cell in case we need her assistance I have the password Thanks

Forms for Recruiting and Other Contract Services Agreement Cc Jane Here are sample SSD and PWD forms I apologize for the delay Please call me with any questions about these forms Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

Jack Wisdom Scheduling ConflictThis is a good newsbad news message Good Robert Jones will buy pizza for the group Yea Bad Jack is starting a week trial on Nov and wont be available or the proposed dates for his presentation I know you want to avoid the rest of November because of holidays and PRC Do you want me to schedule him for early January Let me now
Out of Office AutoReply PIPI am out of the office today I will not be available to check email until Sunday Oct

Oct Meeting Cc This email confirms our meeting at pm Monday Oct We will meet in Conference Room EB Mr Jeanneret Please call me from the lobby and I will come down to meet you New Security Requirement My direct number is Thanks Diane

Change in Invoice Header Enron Cc Alice We need to change the header on the invoices you are forwarding to Michelle Cash Beginning immediately the invoices should be addressed as follows Company Name Codes Margaret Daffin EID co Michelle Cash P O Box Houston Texas Margaret will be reviewing and coding these invoices Michelle will provide a second review and approval on an asneeded basis Thanks for all your help I have enjoyed working with you Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

Bob Rosner VisitI have confirmed the arrangements for the Bob Rosner visit on Oct Conference Room EB has been reserved from am to am Sparky the Enron shuttle driver will pick up Kerry and Mr Rosner at am at the Four Seasons Hotel He will meet Mr Rosner at am in fron of the Enron building and return him to the Four Seasons Hotel If you have any questions please call me Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

Happy New Year and Other BusinessI hope you and the family have a great New Year We are not sure where we will be this week so I dont think well make it to the party I hope you have fun I saw the email from Kerry Notestine and called him Twanda sent the information he needed re McGowan Hes got everything ready but hes not sure you got to speak with the Weil Gotchal attorneys to see if it was OK to file the lawsuit Please call him Thanks Im filing Project April

RE MidYear PRC Data for JeaneretteIll do it Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Friday October AM To Goode Diane Cc Palmer Lizzette Subject FW MidYear PRC Data for Jeanerette Diane could you please get with Andrea to get this info to Dick Jeanerettes group Id like to have his group run statistical analyses on this data Michelle Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Thursday October PM To Cash Michelle Schultea Kathryn Subject MidYear PRC Data for Jeanerette Michelle After reviewing the data that I prepared a few weeks ago wo HR I still felt uncomfortable with the data integrity isses especially after getting feedback from Felecia on how she has pulled the data in the past So I have scrubbed the data as much as possible and am attaching the business objects reports so that Kathy can run under her ID to capture the HR data This will prevent her from creating the report from scratch I would like to prepare a list of some of the required analysis and be included in the conversation with Jeanerette when providing instructions I will send this to you in the am Kathy If you can run the reports export to excel and deliver a file to Michelle Cash tomorrow I would greatly appreciate it Please let me know if you make any changes to the query so that I stay in sync as I generate other reports File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviation expatsrep File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviationrep Please note the following challenges Although HRGISWP and the Demographics Universe have a lot of the same datafields Felecia recommended that I merge the performance data into the Demographics data I was unable to do this in BO because the universes are not compatible and BO only allows you to combine queries from the same universe Exporting to Excel is really too manually intensive and I am trying not to create additional databases as done in the past My plan is to document the processes identify the going forward requirements and submit for automation The expats data in the UK is coming from SAPUK and they do not configure for ethnicity on that version So in HRGISWP the ethnicity is showing Unknown UK Expats also have two different records in the data warehouse and they are not tied together in anyway I manually identified the ethnicity that resides in the US version and coded the ethnicity as a variable in the expat query There is still a lot of blank ethnicity fields and I will be send the HR Generalist a note to update the source system In trying to identify US employees I came across potential mapping issues with the currency code Questions have been forwarded to Kathy Schultea for review There was one expat employee filtered out that was not on US payroll but showed his salary as USD A positive note Today Leticia Barrios provided me with an update to the data mart which now shows the data source Although the problem is not resolved this made the scrubbing much easier Please let me know if you have any questions Andrea Yowman Enron Corp

RE MidYear PRC DataIll schedule the meeting after we get data from Kathy Schultea and we know its in a workable format for Dick Jeanerret Kathy said data would get to us today Original Message From Cash Michelle Sent Monday October PM To Schultea Kathryn Yowman Andrea Goode Diane Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Thanks Kathy Diane would you please ask Dick to make sure that he can work with the files Once he has done that lets set up a meeting with him Jeff Donahue Andrea you and me to discuss approach Kathy do you think you need to attend Dick can be in person or on the phone although an inperson meeting may be preferable Thanks Michelle Original Message From Schultea Kathryn Sent Monday October AM To Yowman Andrea Goode Diane Cc Cash Michelle Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Ill be providing you these files today Original Message From Yowman Andrea Sent Monday October AM To Goode Diane Cc Cash Michelle Schultea Kathryn Subject RE MidYear PRC Data Sensitivity Confidential Hi Diane The attached files are Business Objects reports and should be converted to excel by Kathy Schultea Kathy should be adding the HR employees and then the files should go directly with Jeanneret No need to copy me on the files due to confidentiality of HR data You can just let me know the files went Thanks ay Original Message From Goode Diane Sent Monday October AM To Cc Cash Michelle Yowman Andrea Subject MidYear PRC Data Importance High Sensitivity Confidential File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviationrep File Diversity Mid Year Download for calculating Standard deviation expatsrep Mr Jeanneret I am forwarding these file at Michelle Cashs request After you have received and opened these files please call Michelle Cash to discuss the types of analyses we would like to have performed on the data Michelle Cashs direct number is If you have any problems with the attachments please contact me at the number below Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom Privileged and Confidential Prepared in Anticipation of Litigation

Military Leave Update Cc We anticipate that some of our employees will be called for military duty in the coming months To help you answer employee questions about military leave we have attached a chapter we received from outside counsel To save you some time I have prepared a list of the main issues discussed in the chapter Please call Michelle Cash or me with specific questions regarding military leave issues Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

Analytics Press John Koomey Consulting AgreementAmy has additional questions from John Koomey Can we change the wording in Section a to per oneday course plus the actual price of course books Can we delete the last sentence in Section b Examples of acceptable forms Does Section mean Koomey can present his math and calculation class to other companies as long as he does not refer to Enron does not use Enron teaching examples and does not use use disclose any Enronspecific information Thanks Im printing these questions and I have pulled the Agreement for you to look at

Casey v NEPCO Scheduling Order Deadlines Cc I did not calendar these on Michelles calendar since you are handling Michelle FYI Lizzette I dont have access to your calendar so I wasnt able to log these entries Deadlines January JoinderAddition of Parties February Preliminary Exhibit and Witness Lists February Defendant to Make Written Offer by this date March Plaintiff to respond to Written Offer by this date March Final Exhibit and Witness Lists due April Discovery Deadline Pretrial Motions in Limine must be filed pretrial May Defendant Must Complete Pretrial Order days before Pretrial May Pretrial Conference June Trial date am No settlement conference requested

Letters to RWE re Solicitation of Employees Cc Janette At Michelle Cashs request I have prepared the attached letters for the CEO and two managing directors of RWE Trading We have set the letters up to go to both the Germany and United Kingdom addresses We are still working on an address and name for the General Counsel Since their London office is closed for the day it will probably be Thursday morning before I get those details Please call me if you need additional information Thanks Diane Goode Senior Specialist Enron North America Smith Street EB Houston TX fax Diane nroncom

Mexico Employees Vacation Other Benefits Cc Meliza Evanson called Friday asking about vacation and other benefits for Mexico employees Meliza said she has been using the standard week vacation benefit for the Mexico offer letters etc The Mexico Agreement we sent her for her information suggests a different vacation schedule Meliza indicated there is a lot of confusion regarding the benefits for the Mexico employees Meliza has put together a page benefit guide for the Mexico employees based on information she has gathered We need to get clarification of the benefits and to approve her handout Who has final say about the benefits Can you direct me Thanks

Meeting Thursday Correctionapologies I sent invitations to the Thursday afternoon meeting but failed to change the meeting time to pm Please calendar the meeting in Conference Room EB for pm not am as shown on the meeting invitation This is the first time Ive set a meeting this way Sorry for the inconvenience
